class.name: NuGetDependency
class.description: [The NuGet Dependency Trigger](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?NuGet+Dependency+Trigger) allows starting a new build if a NuGet packages update is detected in the NuGet repository. Note that if a custom NuGet executable is used, it must be explicitly allowed on this server.

param.name: nuget.exe
param.description: A custom path to NuGet.exe. Absolute paths are supported. It can reference to Nuget.exe Tool installed via Administration | Tools.

param.name: nuget.source
param.description: The NuGet packages feed URL to monitor packages changes. Leave blank to use default NuGet feed.

param.name: nuget.username
param.description: A username to access NuGet feed, leave blank if no authentication is required.

param.name: secure:nuget.password
param.description: A password to access NuGet feed, leave blank if no authentication is required.

param.name: nuget.package
param.description: A Package Id to check for updates.

param.name: nuget.version
param.description: Specify package version to check. Leave empty to check for latest version.

param.name: nuget.include.prerelease
param.description: Trigger build if pre-release package version is detected.
